## Grade Projection Calculator

This table lets you enter your scores by category and automatically see your totals.

It is roughly the same as the Grade Projector on Canvas.

```{=html}
<!-- Tabulator assets -->
<link href="https://unpkg.com/tabulator-tables@5.6.1/dist/css/tabulator.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script src="https://unpkg.com/tabulator-tables@5.6.1/dist/js/tabulator.min.js"></script>

<!-- Custom UO Styling -->
<style>
  /* UO Colors */
  :root {
    --uo-green: #007030;
    --uo-yellow: #FEE11A;
  }

  /* Table header styling */
  #grade-table .tabulator-col {
    background-color: var(--uo-green) !important;
    color: white !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    font-size: 1em;
  }

  /* Hover color */
  #grade-table .tabulator-row:hover {
    background-color: var(--uo-yellow) !important;
  }

  /* Make category labels bold */
  #grade-table .tabulator-cell:first-child {
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  /* Centered summary with UO-green text */
  #grade-summary {
    color: var(--uo-green);
  }
</style>

<!-- Table container -->
<div id="grade-table"></div>

<!-- Summary output -->
<div id="grade-summary"
     style="
       margin-top:1em;
       font-weight:bold;
       font-size:1.3em;
       text-align:center;
     ">
</div>

<script>

// ------------------------------
// TABLE DATA
// ------------------------------
var gradeData = [
  {category: "Quiz", item: "Quiz 1", possible: 10, scored: 0},
  {category: "Quiz", item: "Quiz 2", possible: 10, scored: 0},
  {category: "Quiz", item: "Quiz 3", possible: 10, scored: 0},
  {category: "Quiz", item: "Quiz 4", possible: 10, scored: 0},

  {category: "Problem Set", item: "PS 1", possible: 50, scored: 0},
  {category: "Problem Set", item: "PS 2", possible: 50, scored: 0},
  {category: "Problem Set", item: "PS 3", possible: 50, scored: 0},
  {category: "Problem Set", item: "PS 4", possible: 50, scored: 0},

  {category: "Exam", item: "Midterm", possible: 100, scored: 0},

  {category: "Final Project", item: "Topic Selection", possible: 5, scored: 0},
  {category: "Final Project", item: "Annotated Bibliography", possible: 10, scored: 0},
  {category: "Final Project", item: "Rough Slides/Presentation Outline", possible: 10, scored: 0},
  {category: "Final Project", item: "Final Presentation", possible: 15, scored: 0}
];

// ------------------------------
// WEIGHTS
// ------------------------------
var weights = {
  "Quiz": 0.10,
  "Problem Set": 0.20,
  "Exam": 0.30,
  "Final Project": 0.40
};

// ------------------------------
// TABULATOR TABLE
// ------------------------------
var table = new Tabulator("#grade-table", {
    data: gradeData,
    layout: "fitColumns",
    reactiveData: true,
    columns: [
        {title: "Category", field: "category", headerSort:false},
        {title: "Item", field: "item", headerSort:false},
        {title: "Points Possible", field: "possible", hozAlign:"right"},
        {
          title: "Points Scored",
          field: "scored",
          editor: "number",
          validator: ["min:0"],
          hozAlign: "right",
          cellEdited: function(){ updateSummary(); }
        }
    ]
});

// ------------------------------
// LETTER GRADE FUNCTION
// ------------------------------
function letterGrade(pct) {
    if (pct >= 93) return "A";
    if (pct >= 90) return "A-";
    if (pct >= 87) return "B+";
    if (pct >= 83) return "B";
    if (pct >= 80) return "B-";
    if (pct >= 77) return "C+";
    if (pct >= 73) return "C";
    if (pct >= 70) return "C-";
    if (pct >= 67) return "D+";
    if (pct >= 63) return "D";
    if (pct >= 60) return "D-";
    return "F";
}

// ------------------------------
// WEIGHTED GRADE CALCULATION
// ------------------------------
function updateSummary() {
    let data = table.getData();

    // Gather totals by category
    let categories = {};

    data.forEach(row => {
        if (!categories[row.category]) {
            categories[row.category] = {scored: 0, possible: 0};
        }
        categories[row.category].scored += Number(row.scored || 0);
        categories[row.category].possible += row.possible;
    });

    // Compute weighted grade
    let finalPct = 0;

    for (const cat in categories) {
        let pct = categories[cat].scored / categories[cat].possible; // category percentage
        let weight = weights[cat];
        finalPct += pct * weight; // add weighted contribution
    }

    finalPct = (finalPct * 100).toFixed(2);
    let grade = letterGrade(finalPct);

    document.getElementById("grade-summary").innerHTML =
      `Weighted Final Grade: ${finalPct}% â€” Letter Grade: ${grade}`;
}

// Initialize
updateSummary();

</script>
```
